channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-10651] ORC file footer cache should be bounded
item.description: ORC's file footer cache is currently unbounded and is a soft reference cache. The cache size got from config is used to set initial capacity. We should bound the cache from growing too big and to get a predictable performance.
item.summary: ORC file footer cache should be bounded

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: This /might/ also affect LLAP when running w/o IO elevator.

Overall: -1 at least one tests failed
